TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CreateUserWizardStep extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep
Public NotInheritable Class CreateUserWizardStep Inherits TemplatedWizardStep

summary.span: 包含以可建立範本之步驟建立使用者的基本功能。

span.span: Contains basic functionality for creating a user in a step that can be templated.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制網站的使用者資料存放區中建立新的使用者帳戶。The control creates new user accounts in a Web site's user data store. 是，根據預設，第一個步驟中的控制項。The is, by default, the first step within the control. 步驟是必要的步驟，在控制項。The step is a required step within the control. 類別衍生自類別。The class is derived from the class. 會顯示在控制之前步驟。The is displayed in the control before the step. > [!NOTE] > 雖然步驟是預設精靈中的第一個步驟，就可以提供不同的第一個步驟。Although the step is the first step in the wizard by default, it is possible to provide a different first step. 這麼做因此，不過，可能會影響是否**Previous**按鈕會顯示。Doing so, however, can affect whether the **Previous** button is displayed. 比方說，如果步驟並沒有自訂巡覽樣板，並加上另一個轉譯之前的步驟，則**Previous** 按鈕會顯示在在執行階段的步驟。For example, if the step does not have a custom navigation template, and is preceded by another step that is rendered before , then the **Previous** button is displayed on the step at run time. 如果步驟會呈現之前替代的"first"步驟中，則**Previous**按鈕不會顯示。If the step is rendered before the alternate "first" step, then the **Previous** button is not displayed. 此外， **Previous**按鈕永遠不會在設計階段中呈現。Furthermore, the **Previous** button is never rendered at design time. 如果您想**上一步**按鈕在設計階段呈現，您必須將它加入的自訂巡覽樣板步驟。If you want the **Previous** button to be rendered at design time, you must add it to the custom navigation template of the step. 您可以修改逐步執行以包含額外的欄位，或變更中包含的欄位的顯示順序步驟中，藉由編輯與控制項相關聯的範本。You can modify the step to contain additional fields, or change the display order of the fields included in the step, by editing the template associated with the control. 當使用者按一下資料存放區中建立新的網站使用者帳戶**下一步**按鈕步驟。The new Web site user account is created in the data store when the user clicks the **Next** button on the step. 根據預設，屬性設定為`false`若要讓使用者不需要回到步驟並不小心嘗試利用相同的認證來建立另一個使用者帳戶。By default, the property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果您設定屬性設`true`，您必須包含邏輯，在您的應用程式移除之前，使用者返回此步驟中，原先建立的使用者帳戶，或允許使用者編輯他或她原本輸入的資訊。If you set the property to `true`, you must include logic in your application to remove the user account that was originally created before the user returned to this step, or to allow the user to edit information he or she originally entered. ## Examples 第一個程式碼範例會使用簡短格式的宣告式語法將其他控制項加入類別控制項。The first code example uses the short-form declarative syntax of the class to add an additional control to a control. 在程式碼範例需要在 Web.config 檔案中的下列項目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個控制項具有接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅的文字方塊。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 在網頁中的使用者輸入可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。User input in a Web page can potentially contain malicious client script. 根據預設，ASP.NET 網頁會驗證使用者輸入，確保輸入不包含 HTML 項目或指令碼。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate user input to ensure that the input does not contain HTML elements or script. 只要已啟用這項驗證，則您不需要明確檢查有指令碼或在使用者輸入中的 HTML 項目。As long as this validation is enabled, you do not need to explicitly check for script or HTML elements in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). 第二個的程式碼範例會列出完整控制項。The second code example lists the complete control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardStep/CS/createuserwizardstepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardStep/VB/createuserwizardstepvb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個控制項具有接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅的文字方塊。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 在網頁中的使用者輸入可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。User input in a Web page can potentially contain malicious client script. 根據預設，ASP.NET 網頁會驗證使用者輸入，確保輸入不包含 HTML 項目或指令碼。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate user input to ensure that the input does not contain HTML elements or script. 只要已啟用這項驗證，則您不需要明確檢查有指令碼或在使用者輸入中的 HTML 項目。As long as this validation is enabled, you do not need to explicitly check for script or HTML elements in user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指示是否允許使用者從 控制項中的後續步驟返回至目前步驟。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to return to the current step from a subsequent step in a control.

value.span: 如果允許使用者返回至 步驟，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user is allowed to return to the step; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為`false`，讓使用者回到步驟並不小心嘗試利用相同的認證來建立另一個使用者帳戶。The property is set to `false` to keep users from returning to the step and accidentally trying to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果您覆寫屬性並將它設定為`true`，您必須包含您要移除的使用者帳戶，最初建立之前，使用者返回此步驟中，或允許使用者編輯資訊，他或她的應用程式邏輯原始輸入。If you override the property and set it to `true`, you should include logic in your application to remove the user account that was originally created before the user returned to this step, or to allow the user to edit information he or she originally entered.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項之 步驟中要顯示的使用者介面 (UI) 類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of user interface (UI) to display for the step of a control.

value.span: 列舉型別的 列舉型別值。

span.span: The enumeration value of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定要顯示的使用者帳戶建立步驟的導覽選項控制項。The property specifies the navigation options to display for the user-account-creation step of the control. 屬性會決定哪些控制項的瀏覽按鈕會顯示在控制項。The property determines which of the control's navigation buttons are displayed on the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. > [!CAUTION] > 如果您嘗試變更以外的任何值的屬性的值列舉，就會擲回。If you attempt to change the property to any value other than the value of the enumeration, an will be thrown. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

exception.span: 嘗試將 屬性設定為不同於 列舉型別值的值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property to a value other than the enumeration value.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項之使用者帳戶建立步驟所使用的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the title to use for the user-account-creation step of the control.

value.span: 此標題將用於 控制項的使用者帳戶建立步驟。

span.span: The title to use for the user-account-creation step of the control.

value.span: 預設值為 [註冊您的新帳戶]。

span.span: The default value is "Sign up for your new account."

value.span: 控制項的預設文字會依據伺服器目前的地區設定進行當地語系化。

span.span: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
